derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'having a tendency to increase'): from Old French augmentatif, -ive or medieval Latin augmentativus, from the verb augmentare (see augment)

means.word_mean: 1. increasing or having the power to increase especially in size or amount or degree;

sentences.sentence: "`up' is an augmentative word in `hurry up'"
